description: Replacement of existing window and external door with the front and rear facades and installation of replacement ground floor rear window and external door
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: Proposed Front Elevation drawing no.2316-P/P/01, Proposed Rear Elevation drawing no.2316-P/P/02, Window and External Door schedule drawing no.2316-P/W+ED/01, Cross Section Drawing Double Glazing (GW1 to 3 and FW 1 to 4) drawing no.2316-P/DL-W/01, Cross Section Drawing Double Glazing (FW5) drawing no.2316-P/DL-W/02 and , Cross Section External Door (ED1) drawing 2316-P/DL-D/01
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per submitted application form or approved drawings (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19), policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated) - sections 12 and 16.
